General.Name: Greatland Gold plc
General.Description: Greatland Gold plc engages in the exploration and development of precious and base metals in the United Kingdom and Australia. It explores for gold, copper, cobalt, and nickel deposits. The company's flagship asset is the Havieron deposit in the Paterson region of Western Australia. Greatland Gold plc was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 33 St. James's Square, London, United Kingdom, SW1Y 4JS
